Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship study: short antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Oh JE, Hong SY, Lee KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=11µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1550(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 2592(MIC=22µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 36232(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 36232(MIC=>100µg/ml)
